"Hello, Wrath, nice eather we're having, huh?" Stranato said, smiling at Wr=
ath, trying to be nice even though he really wanted to insult him...
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com=
 
  Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 4:07 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *=
Infectra nodded and looked around not really knowing who to choose*

  *The=
n Wrath steps out of the CR Chamber and see's The Radicons with Infectra an=
d walks up to them*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
  =
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 3:26 AM
    Subje=
ct: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    "Whomever seems friendliest." Airbomber replie=
d to Infectra...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: iloveallli=
zards 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 9:=
01 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      Infectra: Okay, umm....whic=
h one??? *Infectra says to Airbomber*
        ----- Original Message ----- =

        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Thurs=
day, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        "W=
ell, you shall be amazed at how much Liono screwed up the future, but you s=
hould go and get aquainted with some of the other bots." Airbomber said to =
Infectra...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: iloveal=
llizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July =
06, 2000 4:43 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          *Infectr=
a nodded and looked around* Infectra: What should I expect to happen or fin=
d out here? *Infectra says to The Radicons*
            ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
           Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM
            Subject: Re: N=
eo Beast Wars


            "Give them a chance, I'm sure they'll like you.=
" Airbomber whispered back to Infectra...
              ----- Original Mess=
age ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 3:23 AM
            =
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *Infectra smiles waves to any=
 bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I don't think they like me. *Infectra whi=
spers to Airbomber*
                ----- Original Message ----- 
         =
       From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
             =
   Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:47 PM
                Subject: Re: Neo=
 Beast Wars


                "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making=
 sure nobody was aiming their blaster's at Infectra.

                "Hey,=
 everyone! This is Infectra! She's with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa grow=
led.

                "These Radicons fired at me, Artist, and Dracona when=
 we tried to help them and ran away! I don't think they could be trusted!" =
Plintissa said.

                "We have our gestalt form and we're useful=
 and powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
           =
       ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizard=
s 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Tuesda=
y, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  =
                *Infectra nods and follows the Radicons* Infectra: How can =
you tell if one is not to be trusted? *Infectra says to the Radicons*
     =
               ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: THEC=
ODE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: =
Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
                    Subject: Neo Beast Wars
=


                    Sinesis and Sinister both kept poking each other, but=
 saying nothing when the other looked. They both grabbed their swords and w=
ere about to stab each other, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy=
 hug instead.

                    Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow =
Artist and they walked off to the Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

=
                    "Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here just star=
ing?" Plintissa asked. Dracona started to look around in logical places a l=
unatic might hide.

                    Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitt=
ing around and drinking tea and they left again.

                    "Who =
shall we join with, dear?" Inzola asked.

                    "Whomever wan=
ts out assistance." Deemos replies. They walk on until they see the Allianc=
e base.

                    "This one looks good, lets go and ask them if =
they have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked up to the=
 base.

                    "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join you=
r fine team, we have been looking for a faction to join, and it appears tha=
t it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join y=
ou, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, pl=
ease, no killing a bot things or anything.)

                    Gangon had=
 a nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chair when Sinister and Sine=
sis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pulled=
 of their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head Deem=
os. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and remembe=
red that he couldn't move. He considered that thing about getting a replace=
ment body, how it would be a good idea just in case he had to get out of th=
is dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for Pli=
ntissa and Dracona to come back.

                    The Radicons looked a=
t Infectra.

                    "Now, all you need to do is follow us, we =
have set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't mind, seeing as=
 how you would make a great addition to their group." Airbomber said. They =
walked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to follow.

       =
             Artist walked around the war room in circles, not quite knowin=
g where he was going.
